greeting.l1: Poly Haven is a curated public asset library for visual effects artists and game designers, providing useful high quality 3D assets in an easily obtainable manner.
greeting.l2: There are no paywalls, accounts or email forms required, just download an asset and use it without worry.
greeting.l3: All stuff here are <lnk>CC0</lnk>, which means they're practically free of copyright and you may use them for absolutely any purpose.
